#summary The border property is a shorthand property for setting 'border-width', 'border-style', and 'border-color'.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *border*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `[ <border-width> || <border-style> || 'border-color' ]`
  * `inherit`
